tool_description: Football stats for major 5 European leagues
name: Football Stats
title: Football Stats

api_list.name: League
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-stats6.p.rapidapi.com/league/serie_a"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-stats6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-stats6.p.rapidapi.com/league/{league_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-stats6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
